start.speaker: Cinderway Warden
start.text:
This caldera is a court. Heat is the law. Ash is the witness.

Bring an Ember Core that still remembers what it burned.

choices.text: Offer a lie and risk the court’s anger.

end.speaker: Narrator
end.text: The heat accepts your offering—or accepts your audacity. Either way, it lets you pass.
